chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been returned to our warehouse. Does the customer prefer a refund or a reshipment?

Regards,
RK

Hi ecomobile,

I will ask the customer and once I have a reply I will come back to you. 

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We await any updates. Thank you!

Regards,
AS

Hi ecomobile,

the customer wants the refund. 

Please proceed with the refund.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Diogo Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We will proceed with the refund soon.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
